trans-unit.source: An abstract class used as the base class for the abstract <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe abstracta utilizada como a classe base para o abstrato <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Block"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"> </xref> classes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> used to fill the background of the content area.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> utilizado para preencher o fundo da área de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: For a table of swatches that show the available predefined brush colors, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>.
trans-unit.target: Para uma tabela de swatches que mostram as cores de Pincel de predefinidas disponíveis, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`||

trans-unit.source: The brush used to fill the background of the content area, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to not use a background brush.
trans-unit.target: O Pincel utilizado para preencher o fundo da área de conteúdo, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> para não utilizar um pincel em segundo plano.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Background*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Background*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Background*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the end of the content in the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> que representa o fim do conteúdo do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentEnd%2A> property is often used to append content to the end of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentEnd%2A>propriedade é frequentemente utilizada para acrescentar conteúdo até ao fim da <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentEnd%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>devolvido por esta propriedade tem sempre o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A>definido como <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the end of the content in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> que representa o fim do conteúdo no <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the start of content in the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> que representa o início do conteúdo do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentStart%2A> property is often used to insert content to the beginning of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentStart%2A>propriedade é frequentemente utilizada para inserir o conteúdo para o início da <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>devolvido por esta propriedade tem sempre o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A>definido como <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointerContext"></xref> that represents the start of the content in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointerContext"> </xref> que representa o início do conteúdo no <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the position just after the end of the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> que representa a posição imediatamente após o fim do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>devolvido por esta propriedade tem sempre o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A>definido como <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the position just after the end of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> que representa a posição imediatamente após o fim do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> that represents the position just before the start of the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> que representa a posição imediatamente antes do início do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>devolvido por esta propriedade tem sempre o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A>definido como <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointerContext"></xref> that represents the position just before the start of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointerContext"> </xref> que representa a posição imediatamente antes do início do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a família de tipo de letra preferido nível superior para o conteúdo do elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> object that specifies the preferred font family, or a primary preferred font family with one or more fallback font families.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> objeto que especifica a família de tipo de letra preferido, ou uma família de tipo de letra preferido primário com um ou mais famílias de tipo de letra de contingência.

trans-unit.source: The default is the font determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é o tipo de letra determinado pelo <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily%2A?displayProperty=fullName> valor.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font size for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho de tipo de letra para o conteúdo do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The desired font size to use in device independent pixels, greater than 0.001 and less than or equal to 35791.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho de tipo de letra pretendido para utilizar num dispositivo independente pixels, maiores 0,001 e inferior ou igual a 35791.

trans-unit.source: The default depends on current system settings and depends on the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição depende das definições de sistema atual e depende do <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> valor.

trans-unit.source: FontSize is set to a value greater than 35791 or less than or equal to 0.001.
trans-unit.target: FontSize está definido para um valor maior que 35791 ou menor que ou igual a 0,001.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font-stretching characteristics for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as características de alongar de tipo de letra para o conteúdo do elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> structure that specifies the desired font-stretching characteristics to use.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref> estrutura que especifica as características de alongar de tipo de letra pretendidas para utilizar.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStretch*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStretch*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStretch*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font style for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de tipo de letra para o conteúdo do elemento.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.FontStyles"></xref> class that specifies the desired font style.
trans-unit.target: Um membro do <xref href="System.Windows.FontStyles"> </xref> classe que especifica o estilo de tipo de letra pretendido.

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é determinada pelo <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> valor.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStyle*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStyle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the top-level font weight for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a importância de nível superior do tipo de letra para o conteúdo do elemento.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.FontWeights"></xref> class that specifies the desired font weight.
trans-unit.target: Um membro do <xref href="System.Windows.FontWeights"> </xref> classe que especifica a espessura do tipo de letra pretendido.

trans-unit.source: The default value is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontWeight%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é determinado pelo <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontWeight%2A?displayProperty=fullName> valor.

trans-unit.source: The brush used to apply to the text contents.

trans-unit.source: Handles notifications that one or more of the dependency properties that exist on the element have had their effective values changed.

trans-unit.source: Arguments associated with the property value change.
trans-unit.target: Alterar argumentos associados ao valor de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.Property*> property specifies which property has changed, the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue*> property specifies the previous property value, and the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.NewValue*> property specifies the new property value.
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> propriedade especifica que propriedade foi alterado, o <> </> *> propriedade especifica o valor da propriedade anterior e o <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.NewValue*>propriedade especifica o novo valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.NewValue*>

trans-unit.source: The dependency object for which to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontWeight*> property.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de dependência para o qual pretende definir o valor do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontWeight*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontWeight*>

trans-unit.source: The new value to set the property to.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor para definir a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: d is .
trans-unit.target: dis .

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*>ligado propriedade para um objeto de dependência especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*>

trans-unit.source: The dependency object for which to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*> property.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de dependência para o qual pretende definir o valor do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground*>

trans-unit.source: The new value to set the property to.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor para definir a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: d is .
trans-unit.target: dis .

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto subordinado.

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: O objeto subordinado para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o conteúdo de texto de um nó para o objeto.

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: O texto a adicionar ao objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of text effects to apply to the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma coleção de efeitos de texto para aplicar o conteúdo do elemento.

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is set to `null` and has no <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, esta propriedade está definida como `null` e tem nenhum <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection>associado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection>

trans-unit.source: Before adding any text effects, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> and assign it to this property.
trans-unit.target: Antes de adicionar quaisquer efeitos de texto, crie um novo <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection>e atribua-a para esta propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`||

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection"></xref> containing one or more <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> objects that define effects to apply to the content in this element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection"> </xref> que contém um ou mais <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"> </xref> objetos que definem os efeitos para aplicar o conteúdo neste elemento.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> (not an empty collection).
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> (não uma coleção vazia).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.TextEffects*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.TextEffects*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.TextEffects*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently effective typography variations for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as variações de tipografia atualmente eficaz para o conteúdo do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.Typography%2A> property is applicable only to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.Typography%2A>propriedade só é aplicável aos [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] tipos de letra.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.Typography%2A>

trans-unit.source: A typography variant has no effect on fonts that do not support the variant.
trans-unit.target: Uma variante de tipografia não tem efeito em tipos de letra que não suportam a variante.

trans-unit.source: For more information on this topic, see [Typography in WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre este tópico, consulte [tipografia no WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Typography"></xref> object that specifies the currently effective typography variations.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Typography"> </xref> objeto que especifica as variações de tipografia atualmente em vigor.

trans-unit.source: For a list of default typography values, see <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Typography"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de tipografia predefinidos, consulte <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Typography"> </xref>.
